subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort was built by Raja Man Singh of Amber?
question_hi: आमरण के राजा मन सिंह ने किस इतिहासिक गैरिया की बनी।
explanation_en: Amer Fort was built by Raja Man Singh of Amber. It is one of the most famous forts in Rajasthan and attracts tourists from across the world.
explanation_hi: आमरण गैरिया, राजा मन सिंह के बाबती है। यह राजस्थान में एक नवीन सर्वों की अप्रत्यक्तियां के में यह नेशन किया है।
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort, built by Rana Kumbha of Mewar, is a strategically located fort and is known for its impregnable walls. It is one of the most visited forts in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कुम्बेलगढ़ गैरिया, Rana कुम्बेह के मेवारे के बने हैंड्से गैरिया
question_en: Which fort was built by Rana Kumbha of Mewar?
question_hi: राजा कुम्बेलगढ़ गैरिया के बने हैंड्से गैरिया
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha of Mewar built the famous Chittorgarh Fort. Chittorgarh Fort is known for its historical significance and strong walls.
explanation_hi: राजा कुम्बेलगढ़ गैरिया, मेवारे के राजगढ़
question_en: Which fort was built by Rana Kumbha of Mewar?
question_hi: राजा कुम्बेलगढ़ गैरिया, मेवारे के राजगढ़
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha of Mewar built the Amber Fort, which is also known as Amer Fort. It is a popular tourist spot in Rajasthan and is famous for its medieval architecture.
question_en: Which fort was built by Rana Kumbha of Mewar?
